message.content:
cs.AR, cs.SE, cs.PL, cs.LG, cs.DC

The paper discusses a solution to the problem of software and hardware co-design and optimization of HPC systems, which involves the use of customizable, plugin-based, schema-free, heterogeneous, open-source Collective Mind repository and infrastructure with unified web interfaces and on-line advise system. The paper also discusses the use of data mining and predictive modeling plugins, as well as machine learning-based meta compilers and statistical analysis and machine learning plugins. Based on this, the most likely arXiv CS sub-categories are cs.AR (Architecture), cs.SE (Software Engineering), cs.PL (Programming Languages), cs.LG (Machine Learning), and cs.DC (Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing).
